channel.title: Error running 508 client
channel.description:
ok i tried searching for the answer but with no luck when i run a 508 client on my computer it comes up with this error any help?
and before you say wrong place to post... i looked all over moparscape and if this isnt the correct place make a new place because this is the only resonable place to even put a question such as this.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Error running 508 client
item.dc:creator: @fashofasho fashofasho
item.description:
@fashofasho wrote:

i also have the same problem… it was working fine all day then i get this error for some reason…

The system cannot find the path specified.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

im using the pulsepk 517 client.
please if anyone could help i will really appreciate it…
thanks

Read full topic
